author: Debra Nussbaum Cohen
title: 'This is what faith teaches us': How Muslim Americans are coming to their Jewish neighbors' aid as hate crimes spike   - U.S. News - Haaretz.com
text: > U.S. News 'This Is What Faith Teaches Us': How Muslim Americans Are Coming to Their Jewish Neighbors' Aid as Hate Crimes Spike At St. Louis cemetery, Jews find hope amid desecration: ‘We really made something positive out of this... it has focused people on importance of fighting anti-Semitism and hatred.’
